type: Tutorial Step - One Token to Rule Them All

definition.text: Unlike some crypto currencies the SA token actually means something!

paragraphs.text: The SA token is a BEP20 token hosted on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC). It represents your amount of investment in the Superalgos project and community. It is a way to reward and grow the Superalgos user base and development pool.
This means that the more you contribute to the project and help others, the more tokens you will earn!
